snippet.title: FINAL FANTASY XV EPISODE ARDYN – Teaser Trailer
snippet.description: Slated for release in March 2019, EPISODE ARDYN offers players a chance to step into the role of FINAL FANTASY XV’s main antagonist. Set before the events of FINAL FANTASY XV, players will learn more about Ardyn’s backstory in a story of death and restoration.
